name: CreateALevel
description:
Level creator where you can make levels and share them in the comments

Look in "example levels" to see how to make a level

Levels are saved onto your computer, so your levels are safe when closing the game

If you find bugs, tell me

Also im sorry for the bad art, if you try hard enough you can make it look good

To play somebody's level, paste (ctrl+v) the level data into the "level content" box when adding a level. (you need to type in  a name)

If copy pasting levels doesn't work, try downloading the game.

Controls

(in editor)

  • WASD to move
  • Scroll wheel to scroll through menus
  • Q and E to zoom
How to use features
  • Box in the bottom left is for layering objects. layer 0 = all layers
  • Selecting one object and building more will clone the object
  • Turning snap off will allow you to move objects precisely
  • Turning swipe off will allow you to select only one object
  • Groups in properties are for triggers to animate objects with, look in "trigger tutorial" in example levels
